text: The army is wreathed in a light mist to shield their movement and aid their attack.
Stance: Mist Wreath
The Fimir conjure swirling mists from which to trap their enemies.
Stance: Mist Trap
Sets up a defensive camp, allowing for recruitment and replenishment, whilst raiding wealth from the local region.
Stance: Raiding Camp
War Fervour
Something higher pushes this force to its limits for now at least...
Rise of the Hell-Mother
ME! ME! I SSSHALL BE RULER OF ALL FIMIR! THEN THE HU-MANSSS WILL FEAR USSS AGAIN! WE WILL RETAKE WHAT ISSS OURSSS! HELLMOTHER SKATTACH SHALL RULE ALL!
Fanatics of Kroll

The Tendrils of Doom are a fanatic sect of Fimir, dedicated to worshipping Kroll the All-Mother not as a Daemon Princess, but as the one and true Fimir goddess. They seek to make her apotheosis a reality, hoping they will be rewarded with rulersihp over the world when she turns it into a cursed bog for all eternity.
Slave Built
Work the slaves until they're near death and then sacrifice them.
Unnatural Fog
With a great expenditure of slave lives Fimir can blanket a whole province in an inpenetrable fog.
Unnatural Fog
With a great expenditure of slave lives Fimir can blanket a whole province in an inpenetrable fog.
Trifling God
In the bogs and swamps where Fimir dwell Kroll is spoken of in hushed tones.
Renegade God
Kroll makes her bid for godhood, and Fimir are there to do her bidding.
Patron God
Continent-spanning Fimir-built temples, blood sacrifices made therein, all for their goddess Kroll.
God of the Depths
Kroll is now a Chaos God, and the Fimir are her blessed children.
Apotheosis of Kroll: Trifling God
In her quest for godhood Kroll gives bonuses to her personal army and a diplomacy bonus with all Fimir.
Apotheosis of Kroll: Renegade God
In her quest for godhood Kroll gives bonuses to her personal army and a diplomacy bonus with all Fimir.
Apotheosis of Kroll:  Patron God
In her quest for godhood Kroll gives bonuses to her personal army and can gain a diplomacy bonus with all Fimir.
Apotheosis of Kroll: God of the Depths
In her quest for godhood Kroll gives bonuses to her personal army and a diplomacy bonus with all Fimir.

Fury of the Shearl
With the intervention of the Gods, the usually docile Shearl are sent into a murderous rage.
Horrors of the Swamp
Praise the Mud Father! His Swamp Daemon servants are now empowered with regeneration capabilities!
Passive ability: "Horrible Regeneration" for Swamp Daemons units
Weapon strength: %+n% for Swamp Daemons units
The Fimir can use their magical mist to channel the Winds of Magic, temporarily hide their armies, and offer extra protection against ranged units.
Stance: Channel Mists
Swirling Mist

Fimir strongholds are seldom seen by outsiders, for they are wreathed in thick mist, a miasma which is magically generated by the Fimir to shield their fortresses from prying eyes, and themselves from the harsh glare of the sun.
